item.title: Advanced Marketing Analytics
item.description: What I’ve been up to This blog has been quiet for almost a year now. Mostly because I joined a Marketing Analytics company called Gradient Metrics as an all-round quantitative analyst. Gradient gave me the opportunity to combine my previous marketing experience with my newfound love for data science, and I never looked back. Combining Marketing & Data Science A successful marketing strategy will always require two dimensions. On one end, you’ll find creativity.
